completedHtml: Thank you for completing the assessment
title: Confidentiality Classification Tool
description: Methodology: The risk assessment of a selected product is performed by using a checklist to associate one of three ratings, “LOW”, “MEDIUM” or “HIGH”, with how much effort ("SIGNIFICANT", "SOME" or "LITTLE") that a third party must expend in order to disclose confidential information once the product has become available.

pages.name: page1

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Can confidential information be revealed directly through the information displayed by the product?

choices.text: LOW risk as SIGNIFICANT effort is required
MEDIUM risk as SOME effort is required
HIGH risk as LITTLE effort is required

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Can confidential information be revealed by grouping attributes available in the product?

choices.text: LOW risk as SIGNIFICANT effort is required
MEDIUM risk as SOME effort is required
HIGH risk as LITTLE effort is required

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Can confidential information be revealed through a probabilistic statement derived from the information contained in the product?

choices.text: LOW risk as SIGNIFICANT effort is required
MEDIUM risk as SOME effort is required
HIGH risk as LITTLE effort is required

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Can confidential information be revealed by combining the information contained in this product with that from other products?

choices.text: LOW risk as SIGNIFICANT effort is required
MEDIUM risk as SOME effort is required
HIGH risk as LITTLE effort is required

pages.title: Disclosure Risk Self-Assessment Checklist
pages.description: PURPOSE: Provide a self-assessment of the disclosure risk associated with the product under examination.

pages.name: page2

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Select the highest level of impact a breach would have on an individual, business, or institution from the Sensitivity Rating Legend below, and provide a justification for why you believe this is the case.  The impact must reflect an outcome that can reasonably be expected to occur, rather than one based on an extreme scenario.

pages.title: Sensitivity Self-Assessment Checklist
pages.description: To assess the level of sensitivity of the specified product based on the impact a breach would have on an individual, business or institution.
